job.title: Technical Product Manager, Data Science & Analytics, Apple Media Products - Cupertino
job.description:
Summary
At Apple, great ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. If you are a self-motivated, high-energy individual who is not afraid of challenges, we’re looking for you. Apple is seeking a proven Technical Product Manager (TPM) to join the Apple Media Products Data Science team.


The TPM plays a critical role in collaborating with engineering and data scientists to design, maintain, build or improve mission-critical datasets from a multitude of sources. This role will involve working with internet-scale data across numerous product and customer touch points to drive initiatives that will make our data science organization more streamlined and productive.


The team’s culture is centered on rapid iteration with open feedback and debate along the way, plus tight-knit collaboration with data scientists, product, feature engineering and data engineering.


Key Qualifications
Proven experience in a Technical Product Management role, preferably for a digital-media or subscription business.

Proven experience in data-related programming languages (e.g. SQL, PySpark, Python, or R)

Knowledge of Client-Server metrics logging strategies as well as data architecture required for analysis

Hands on experience with the end-to-end data lifecycle across petabyte scale technologies

Prior experience in a technical role (preferably as a data analyst or engineer), delivering data insights to stakeholders

Strong experience designing and driving product strategy cross-functionally, collaborating with partners of various technical levels.


Description
Data is our product. We are looking for a self-starting, motivated individual with great communication skills that is passionate about managing and developing critical datasets to maximize Data Science capabilities. If you have a passion for Apple services (TV+, Music, Arcade, Podcasts, etc), it would be a big plus!


You should have a strong interest in driving large scale data products, engaging with key business stakeholders involved, and driving key communications throughout the business.


Education & Experience
Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience in Engineering, Computer Science, or Business Information Systems


Role Number: 200242971
